title: Dead Sea Games: Adrift
description: Living in the ruins of Lower Manhattan is a tough life. After the Emergency, the Colony provides what’s left of fifteen-year-old Jeremy Walter’s family with the barest essentials, but they don’t provide hope or a future. Jeremy wakes up every day and treats it as if it was his last day on Earth, because if the zombies, gangs, and games don’t kill him—his mother will. What Jeremy doesn’t realize is that he can’t die because he’s the one thing this broken world desperately needs. A hero.Episode One of the new Dead Sea Games saga.
author: J. Whitworth Hazzard
